generated_body: The article titled "How the 2020 campaigns are defining a new role: The First Gentleman" is likely to explore the evolving political landscape and the implications of gender roles in high-profile political campaigns. Readers might expect an analysis of how the role of the First Gentleman is being shaped by recent electoral trends, particularly in relation to traditional expectations of political spouses. It may include examples of individuals who have taken on this role, highlighting their contributions and public perceptions.
